name: Acolyte
equipment: A holy symbol, a prayer book or prayer wheel, 5 sticks of incense, vestments, a set of common clothes, and a pouch containing 15 GP
description: Has servido a una institución religiosa y conoces sus ritos.

name: Soldier
equipment: An insignia of rank, a trophy from a fallen enemy, a set of bone dice or a deck of cards, a set of common clothes, and a pouch with 10 GP
description: Formaste parte de una fuerza militar; sabes de disciplina y jerarquías.
